channel.title: Looking for Coding Team (718 rev)
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
I am currently in the process of coding a 718 (Rune-Evo) server that I am planning on recreating and creating my own version of the source. At the moment I have not gotten very far since I've only been coding for a couple of days, but with a partner or several partners I will be able to finish this and release the server to the public. Also with two+ different coders it will be easy to fix any issues or solve any problems.
[b]PLEASE READ IF INTERESTED[/b] -While in the stages of coding I will be keeping the server running on Hamachi. -We will be using Dropbox to code. This will allow several of us to code at the same time and automatically update to my files. -My timezone is Eastern time and I will be able to code at around 5-10PM all week round.
[b]AFTER CODING [/b] -After we finish most of what we are trying to accomplish on our server it will be released to the public. -Advertising will be a big roll after this, so that the community can increase and the income from donations can help support the VPS, etc. -My partners and I will all receive Owner ranks. [b] HOW TO REACH ME [/b]-If you are interested please reply to this post and I will answer with a private message with further details.

item.title: Looking for Coding Team (718 rev)
item.dc:creator: @Nika Nika
item.description:
@Nika wrote:

Hello everyone!

I am currently in the process of coding a 718 (Rune-Evo) server that I am planning on recreating and creating my own version of the source. At the moment I have not gotten very far since I’ve only been coding for a couple of days, but with a partner or several partners I will be able to finish this and release the server to the public. Also with two+ different coders it will be easy to fix any issues or solve any problems.

PLEASE READ IF INTERESTED
-While in the stages of coding I will be keeping the server running on Hamachi.
-We will be using Dropbox to code. This will allow several of us to code at the same time and automatically update to my files.
-My timezone is Eastern time and I will be able to code at around 5-10PM all week round.

AFTER CODING
-After we finish most of what we are trying to accomplish on our server it will be released to the public.
-Advertising will be a big roll after this, so that the community can increase and the income from donations can help support the VPS, etc.
-My partners and I will all receive Owner ranks.

HOW TO REACH ME
-If you are interested please reply to this post and I will answer with a private message with further details.

Read full topic
